test.name: Test2:- To verify whether Non Admin user is able to open dashboard page of Admin user
Test3:- To verify whether correct message is displayed when a role is unassigned to a user
Test4:- To verify if user is able to acess the organisation and market place link and also if user is able to see service list if user is assigned NO role
Test5:- To verify if user is able to acess the organisation and market place link and also if user is able to see service list if user is assigned a Manager role
Test6:- To verify whether user can create an org and assign that org a name which has a space in between
Test7:- To verify whether the selected App is Started
Test8 :- To verify whether the selected App is Restaged
Test9:-To verify for the browsers compatibility for browser for latest version using selenium Scriptt
Test10:- To verify whether the selected value gets added to drop down when user scale app memory
Test11:- To verify whether the selected App is Stopped
Test12:- To verify whether the selected App is Deleted
Test13:- To verify whether Brooklyn service gives an error message while deleting it
Test14:-To verify if Non Admin user password is changed successfully and able to open dashboard page of Admin user with newly changed password
Test15:-To verify setting page and social icons
Test16:-To verify whether the route is created
Test17:-To validate max length of the available character in text boxes while creating an org
Test18:-To validate max length of the available character in text boxes while creating an SPACE
Test19:-To validate max length of the available character in text boxes while creating an INSTANCE
Test20:-To verify whether a user is able to create a cups services from console using selenium script
Test21:-To verify user assigned message from console using selenium script
Test22:-To validate max length of the available character in text boxes while creating a Domain Name
Test23:-To validate max length of the available character in text boxes while setting ENV Variable using selenium Script
Test24:-To validate max length of the available character in text boxes while creating ROUTE using selenium Script
Test25:-To verify the invalid characters for password using selenium Script
Test26:-To verify the breadcrumb navigation for console using selenium Scriptt
Test27:-To verify whether a user can create a domain from console
Test28:-To Verify with the Login Validations
Test29:-To verify whether Twitter/Youtube/linkedIN Link is navigated to Twitter/Youtube/LinkedIN Page
Test30:-To verify for multi-lingual support on console login page
Test31:-To verify footer text/CopyrightMessage/cfProduct Details/Column On Test BuildPacks/disclaimer text
Test32:-To Verify if user can access CF according to Auditor/Billing Manager/Mnager/User as a role
Test33:-To verify Pagination of an Organization on Dashboard
Test 34:-Verify FAQ and User Guide links are working using Selenium Script
Test 35:-Verify App Rename functionality is working using Selenium Script
Test 36:-Verify the Updation of User provided Service instances on chrome browser for UI through selenium
